attributes.action: take action now to end the GENOCIDE happening in Darfur
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 400,000 Innocent Men, Women and Children Have Been Slaughtered since 2003. Please sign to apply pressure and persuade Tony Blair to take action now. The Government Funded Janjaweed Militia Army burn villages, kill mercilessly and rape women and girls on a daily basis. Show your Protest against these inhumane actions, and show your want for a UN Peacekeeping force to be deployed there WITH OR WITHOUT the Sudanese Government's Permission. Express your urge for seeing help and rescue from the developed world for the Darfurians who pray for this endlessly, and for the perpertrators to be brought to justice. The systematic murders are taking place now, make our voices heard.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EndDarfur/
And here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Darfur/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
